name: Super Beast Catcher
description:
Tiny action game for the Einhar-themed talent competition.

Tested on Chrome / Windows 10 x64

Controls:

  • Arrow keys: Move
  • Z : Shoot
  • X: Throw Net

Credits:

Made with the free and open-source Godot game engine

Dawnbringer's #db16 palette

Grass and Dirt Sprite modified from DawnLike 16x16 Tileset by DragonDePlatino
